title: Harry Potter
author: Aesop
description: This collection presents nearly 300 of Aesopâ€™s most entertaining and enduring stories

title: The Notebook
author: Nicholas Sparks
description: A deeply moving portrait of love itself, the tender moments and the fundamental changes that affect us all. It is a story of miracles and emotions that will stay with you forever

title: Game of Thrones
author: George R.R. Martin
description: A magnificent cycle of novels that includes A Clash of Kings and A Storm of Swords. As a whole, this series comprises a genuine masterpiece of modern fantasy, bringing together the best the genre has to offer.

title: Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The Lord of the Rings tells of the great quest undertaken by Frodo and the Fellowship of the Ring: Gandalf the Wizard; the hobbits Merry, Pippin, and Sam; Gimli the Dwarf; Legolas the Elf; Boromir of Gondor; and a tall, mysterious stranger called Strider.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter's life is miserable. His parents are dead and he's stuck with his heartless relatives, who force him to live in a tiny closet under the stairs. But his fortune changes when he receives a letter that tells him the truth about himself: he's a wizard.
